meanings.definition: A thing serving as a visible or tangible representation of a fact, quality, feeling, etc.
meanings.sent1: The teacher used colorful tokens to reward good behavior in class.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my tokens for a small toy at the arcade.
meanings.sent3: The tokens in the board game looked like tiny treasures waiting to be found.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a token of gratitude for their help.
meanings.sent5: The golden token shimmered in the sunlight, symbolizing success.

meanings.definition: A piece of stamped metal or plastic that can be used instead of money.
meanings.sent1: The subway tokens were necessary to enter the train station.
meanings.sent2: He dropped his tokens into the vending machine to get a snack.
meanings.sent3: The tokens jingled in his pocket as he walked, like a musical currency.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the token he needed to brighten his day.
meanings.sent5: The silver token gleamed, promising a ride on the carousel.
